[center][font size=5]Comictagger Change Log[/font][/center] [font size=4]2015.06.07[/font] - Initial Release - Add Config Mapping to Template
Container.Description: ComicTagger is a multi-platform app for writing metadata to digital comics, written in Python and PyQt.[/b][br]Map /nobody/.ComicTagger to your unraid appdata folder, for settings[br][b]To increase screen resolution[br]Toggle advanced in this template and adjust[br]HEIGHT and WIDTH to suit[/b]
Container.Overview: ComicTagger is a multi-platform app for writing metadata to digital comics, written in Python and PyQt.
